name: Additive bleeding risk with multiple bleeding-risk drugs
actions: Avoid overlapping bleeding-risk drugs when feasible.
Counsel regarding bleeding signs and symptoms.

rationale: Combined effects increase overall bleeding liability.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both increase bleeding risk. Combined use can significantly increase bleeding liability.

references.citation: PD stacking: additive bleeding risk across antithrombotic domains.
